name: Phoenix Wright Trial Simulation
description:
This is a project for my class that was supposed to just be a short interactive poster, but I misread the instructions and made this as a result.

If you make it to the end, there's an easter egg if you present a certain evidence...

if it doesn't load the first time, reload and it should be fine!

*** CORRECT CHOICES ***

if you want to blaze through, then here are the correct choices:

act 1: "What" : "May Testimony"

act 2: "The Murder" : "Autopsy Report"

act 3: "When" : "Floor Plans"

act 4: "Where" : "Bloody Receipt"

act 5: "Mia's Memo"

Enjoy!
